House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07970
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO INSTITUTIONALIZE REWARDS FOR COMPLIANCE WITH SECTION 32 OF RA 9003, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ECOLOGICAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Aims to recognize and reward barangays with fully-operational Materials Recovery Facilities (MRFs) exhibiting good practice of ecological and solid waste management.
ALIAS NAME : “Best Solid Waste Management Practices of Barangays Act of 2018.”
